permafrost.tundra.io

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.io.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with files.

      • writeFromStream

        public static java.io.File writeFromStream(java.io.File file,
                                           java.io.InputStream content,
                                           boolean append)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes content to a file; if the given file is null, a new temporary file is automatically created.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be written to; if null, a new temporary file is automatically created.
        content - The content to be written.
        append - If true, the content will be appended to the file, otherwise the content will overwrite any previous content in the file.
        Returns:
        The file which the content was written to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem writing to the file.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.File source,
                        java.io.File target,
                        boolean append)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the content in the source file to the target file.
        Parameters:
        source - The file from which content will be copied.
        target - The file to which content will be copied.
        append - If true, the target content will be appended to, otherwise any previous content will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the source file does not exist or there is a problem copying it.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.lang.String source,
                        java.lang.String target,
                        boolean append)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies the content in the source file to the target file.
        Parameters:
        source - The file from which content will be copied.
        target - The file to which content will be copied.
        append - If true, the target content will be appended to, otherwise any previous content will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the source file does not exist or there is a problem copying it.

      • match

        public static boolean match(java.lang.String filename,
                            java.lang.String pattern,
                            boolean patternIsRegularExpression)
        Returns true if the given file matches the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to check against the pattern.
        pattern - Either a regular expression or wildcard pattern.
        patternIsRegularExpression - Boolean indicating if the given pattern is a regular expression or wildcard pattern.
        Returns:
        True if the given file matches the given pattern.

      • match

        public static boolean match(java.io.File file,
                            java.lang.String pattern,
                            boolean patternIsRegularExpression)
        Returns true if the given file matches the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to check against the pattern.
        pattern - Either a regular expression or wildcard pattern.
        patternIsRegularExpression - Boolean indicating if the given pattern is a regular expression or wildcard pattern.
        Returns:
        True if the given file matches the given pattern.
